10 void sq_clampParameters(double& e1_clamped, double& e2_clamped)
11 {
12  if(e1_clamped < 0.1)
13  e1_clamped = 0.1;
14  else if(e1_clamped > 1.9)
15  e1_clamped = 1.9;
16  if(e2_clamped < 0.1)
17  e2_clamped = 0.1;
18  else if(e2_clamped > 1.9)
19  e2_clamped = 1.9;
20 }
21 
22 
23 double sq_function(const PointT& point, const sq_fitting::sq &param)
24 {
25  double e1_clamped = param.e1;
26  double e2_clamped = param.e2;
27  sq_clampParameters(e1_clamped, e2_clamped);
28  double t1 = pow(std::abs(point.x / param.a1), 2.0/e2_clamped);
29  double t2 = pow(std::abs(point.y / param.a2), 2.0/e2_clamped);
30  double t3 = pow(std::abs(point.z / param.a3), 2.0/e1_clamped);
31  double f = pow(std::abs(t1+t2), e2_clamped/e1_clamped) + t3;
32  return (pow(f,e1_clamped) - 1.0 );
33 }
34 
35 double sq_function(const double &x, const double &y, const double &z, const double &a, const double &b, const double &c, const double &e1,
36  const double &e2)
37 {
38  double e1_clamped = e1;
39  double e2_clamped = e2;
40  sq_clampParameters(e1_clamped, e2_clamped);
41 
42  //std::cout<<"e1: "<<e1_clamped<<" e2: "<<e2_clamped<<std::endl;
43  double t1 = pow(std::abs(x / a), 2.0/e2_clamped);
44  double t2 = pow(std::abs(y / b), 2.0/e2_clamped);
45  double t3 = pow(std::abs(z / c), 2.0/e1_clamped);
46  double f = pow(std::abs(t1+t2), e2_clamped/e1_clamped) + t3;
47  double value = (pow(f, e1_clamped/2.0) - 1.0) * pow(a * b * c, 0.25);
48  return (value);
49 
50 }
51 
52 
53 double sq_function_scale_weighting(const PointT& point, const sq_fitting::sq &param)
54 {
55  double e1_clamped = param.e1;
56  double e2_clamped = param.e2;
57  sq_clampParameters(e1_clamped, e2_clamped);
58  double t1 = pow(std::abs(point.x / param.a1), 2.0/e2_clamped);
59  double t2 = pow(std::abs(point.y /param.a2), 2.0/e2_clamped);
60  double t3 = pow(std::abs(point.z /param.a3), 2.0/e1_clamped);
61  double f = pow(std::abs(t1+t2), e2_clamped/e1_clamped) + t3;
62  return (pow(f, e1_clamped/2.0) - 1.0) * pow(param.a1 * param.a2 * param.a3, 0.25);
63 }
64 
65 double sq_error(const pcl::PointCloud<PointT>::Ptr cloud, const sq_fitting::sq &param)
66 {
67  Eigen::Affine3f transform;
68  sq_create_transform(param.pose, transform);
69  pcl::PointCloud<PointT>::Ptr new_cloud(new pcl::PointCloud<PointT>);
70  pcl::transformPointCloud(*cloud, *new_cloud, transform);
71  double error = 0.0;
72  for(size_t i = 0;i<new_cloud->size();++i)
73  {
74  double op = sq_normPoint(new_cloud->at(i));
75  double val = op * sq_function_scale_weighting(new_cloud->at(i), param);
76  error += val * val;
77  }
78  error /= new_cloud->size();
79  return error;
80 }
81 
82 void sq_create_transform(const geometry_msgs::Pose& pose, Eigen::Affine3f& transform)
83 {
84  transform = Eigen::Affine3f::Identity();
85  Eigen::Quaternionf q(pose.orientation.w, pose.orientation.x, pose.orientation.y, pose.orientation.z);
86  q.normalize();
87  transform.translation()<<pose.position.x, pose.position.y, pose.position.z;
88  transform.rotate(q);
89 }
90 
91 double sq_normPoint(const PointT &point)
92 {
93  double value = sqrt(point.x * point.x + point.y * point.y + point.z * point.z);
94  return value;
95 }

97 
98 void euler2Quaternion(const double roll, const double pitch, const double yaw, Eigen::Quaterniond &q)
99 {
100  Eigen::AngleAxisd rollAngle(roll, Eigen::Vector3d::UnitX());
101  Eigen::AngleAxisd pitchAngle(pitch, Eigen::Vector3d::UnitY());
102  Eigen::AngleAxisd yawAngle(yaw, Eigen::Vector3d::UnitZ());
103  q = yawAngle * pitchAngle * rollAngle;
104 }
105 
106 void create_transformation_matrix(const double tx, const double ty, const double tz, const double ax, const double ay, const double az, Eigen::Affine3d &trns_mat)
107 {
108  trns_mat = Eigen::Affine3d::Identity();
109  Eigen::Affine3d rot_matrix = Eigen::Affine3d::Identity();
110  create_rotation_matrix(ax, ay, az, rot_matrix);
111  Eigen::Affine3d translation_matrix(Eigen::Translation3d(Eigen::Vector3d(tx, ty, tz)));
112  trns_mat = translation_matrix*rot_matrix;// * translation_matrix;
113 }
114 
115 void create_rotation_matrix(const double ax, const double ay, const double az, Eigen::Affine3d &rot_matrix)
116 {
117  Eigen::Affine3d rx = Eigen::Affine3d(Eigen::AngleAxisd(ax, Eigen::Vector3d(1,0,0)));
118  Eigen::Affine3d ry = Eigen::Affine3d(Eigen::AngleAxisd(ay, Eigen::Vector3d(0,1,0)));
119  Eigen::Affine3d rz = Eigen::Affine3d(Eigen::AngleAxisd(az, Eigen::Vector3d(0,0,1)));
120  rot_matrix = rx * rz * ry;
121 }
122 
123 void getParamFromPose(const geometry_msgs::Pose &pose, double &tx, double &ty, double &tz, double &ax, double &ay, double &az)
124 {
125  Eigen::Affine3f transformation = Eigen::Affine3f::Identity();
126  sq_create_transform(pose, transformation);
127  Eigen::Affine3d transformation_d = transformation.cast<double>();
128  Eigen::Vector3d t = transformation_d.translation();
129  Eigen::Matrix3d rot_matrix =transformation_d.rotation();
130  tx = t(0);
131  ty = t(1);
132  tz = t(2);
133  Eigen::Vector3d rot_angle = rot_matrix.eulerAngles(0,1,2);
134  ax = rot_angle[0] ;
135  ay = rot_angle[1] ;
136  az = rot_angle[2] ;
137 }
138 
139 
140 void getParamFromPose(const Eigen::Affine3d &trans, double &tx, double &ty, double &tz, double &ax, double &ay, double &az)
141 {
142  Eigen::Vector3d t = trans.translation();
143  Eigen::Matrix3d rot_matrix =trans.rotation();
144  tx = t(0);
145  ty = t(1);
146  tz = t(2);
147  Eigen::Vector3d rot_angle = rot_matrix.eulerAngles(0,1,2);
148  ax = rot_angle[0] ;
149  ay = rot_angle[1] ;
150  az = rot_angle[2] ;
151 
152 }

154 void Quaternion2Euler(const geometry_msgs::Pose &pose, double &ax, double &ay, double &az)
155 {
156  Eigen::Quaterniond q(pose.orientation.w, pose.orientation.x, pose.orientation.y, pose.orientation.z);
157  q.normalize();
158  Eigen::Vector3d euler = q.toRotationMatrix().eulerAngles(0,1,2);
159  euler[0] = ax;
160  euler[1] = ay;
161  euler[2] = az;
162 
163 }

168 void getCenter(pcl::PointCloud<PointT>::Ptr& cloud_in, double& x, double& y, double& z)
169 {
170  double val_x = cloud_in->points.at(0).x;
171  double val_y = cloud_in->points.at(0).y;
172  double val_z = cloud_in->points.at(0).z;
173  double x_max = val_x, x_min = val_x, y_max = val_y, y_min = val_y, z_max = val_z, z_min = val_z;
174  for(int i=0;i<cloud_in->points.size();++i)
175  {
176  if (cloud_in->points.at(i).x>=x_max)
177  x_max = cloud_in->points.at(i).x;
178  if (cloud_in->points.at(i).x<=x_min)
179  x_min = cloud_in->points.at(i).x;
180  if (cloud_in->points.at(i).y>=y_max)
181  y_max = cloud_in->points.at(i).y;
182  if (cloud_in->points.at(i).y<=y_min)
183  y_min = cloud_in->points.at(i).y;
184  if (cloud_in->points.at(i).z>=z_max)
185  z_max = cloud_in->points.at(i).z;
186  if (cloud_in->points.at(i).z<=z_min)
187  z_min = cloud_in->points.at(i).z;
188  }
189  x = (x_max+x_min)/2;
190  y = (y_max+y_min)/2;
191  z = (z_max+z_min)/2;
192 
193 }
194 
195 
196 void getTransformPose(pcl::PointCloud<PointT>::Ptr& cloud_in, geometry_msgs::Pose &pose)
197 {
198 
199  // Compute z height as maximum distance from planes
200  double val_z = cloud_in->points.at(0).z;
201  double z_max = val_z, z_min = val_z;
202  for(int i=0;i<cloud_in->points.size();++i)
203  {
204  if (cloud_in->points.at(i).z>=z_max)
205  z_max = cloud_in->points.at(i).z;
206  if (cloud_in->points.at(i).z<=z_min)
207  z_min = cloud_in->points.at(i).z;
208  }
209 
210  double height = z_max -z_min;
211  double min_volume = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
212  Eigen::Matrix3f transformation;
213  // Find the convex hull
214  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB> hull;
215  pcl::ConvexHull<pcl::PointXYZRGB> convex_hull;
216  convex_hull.setInputCloud(cloud_in);
217  convex_hull.setDimension(2);
218  convex_hull.reconstruct(hull);
219 
220  // Try fitting a rectangle
221  for (size_t i = 0; i < hull.size() - 1; ++i) {
222  // For each pair of hull points, determine the angle
223  double rise = hull[i + 1].y - hull[i].y;
224  double run = hull[i + 1].x - hull[i].x;
225  // and normalize..
226  {
227  double l = sqrt((rise * rise) + (run * run));
228  rise = rise / l;
229  run = run / l;
230  }
231 
232  // Build rotation matrix from change of basis
233  Eigen::Matrix3f rotation;
234  rotation(0, 0) = run;
235  rotation(0, 1) = rise;
236  rotation(0, 2) = 0.0;
237  rotation(1, 0) = -rise;
238  rotation(1, 1) = run;
239  rotation(1, 2) = 0.0;
240  rotation(2, 0) = 0.0;
241  rotation(2, 1) = 0.0;
242  rotation(2, 2) = 1.0;
243  Eigen::Matrix3f inv_rotation = rotation.inverse();
244 
245  // Project hull to new coordinate system
246  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB> projected_cloud;
247  for (size_t j = 0; j < hull.size(); ++j)
248  {
249  pcl::PointXYZRGB p;
250  p.getVector3fMap() = rotation * hull[j].getVector3fMap();
251  projected_cloud.push_back(p);
252  }
253 
254  // Compute min/max
255  double x_min = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
256  double x_max = std::numeric_limits<double>::min();
257  double y_min = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
258  double y_max = std::numeric_limits<double>::min();
259  for (size_t j = 0; j < projected_cloud.size(); ++j)
260  {
261  if (projected_cloud[j].x < x_min) x_min = projected_cloud[j].x;
262  if (projected_cloud[j].x > x_max) x_max = projected_cloud[j].x;
263 
264  if (projected_cloud[j].y < y_min) y_min = projected_cloud[j].y;
265  if (projected_cloud[j].y > y_max) y_max = projected_cloud[j].y;
266  }
267 
268 
269  // Is this the best estimate?
270  double area = (x_max - x_min) * (y_max - y_min);
271  if (area * height < min_volume)
272  {
273  //transformation = inv_plane_rotation * inv_rotation;
274  transformation = inv_rotation;
275  //dimensions->x = (x_max - x_min);
276  // dimensions->y = (y_max - y_min);
277  //dimensions->z = height;
278 
279  Eigen::Vector3f pose3f((x_max + x_min) / 2.0, (y_max + y_min) / 2.0, projected_cloud[0].z + height / 2.0);
280  pose3f = transformation * pose3f;
281  pose.position.x = pose3f(0);
282  pose.position.y = pose3f(1);
283  pose.position.z = pose3f(2);
284  Eigen::Quaternionf q(transformation);
285  pose.orientation.x = q.x();
286  pose.orientation.y = q.y();
287  pose.orientation.z = q.z();
288  pose.orientation.w = q.w();
289  min_volume = area * height;
290  }
291  }
292 }

296 void getCompletePose(pcl::PointCloud<PointT>::Ptr& cloud_in, geometry_msgs::Pose &pose)
297 {
298 
299  // Compute y height as maximum distance from planes
300  double val_x = cloud_in->points.at(0).x;
301  double x_max = val_x, x_min = val_x;
302  for(int i=0;i<cloud_in->points.size();++i)
303  {
304  if (cloud_in->points.at(i).x>=x_max)
305  x_max = cloud_in->points.at(i).x;
306  if (cloud_in->points.at(i).x<=x_min)
307  x_min = cloud_in->points.at(i).x;
308  }
309 
310  double height = x_max -x_min;
311  double min_volume = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
312  Eigen::Matrix3f transformation;
313  // Find the convex hull
314  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB> hull;
315  pcl::ConvexHull<pcl::PointXYZRGB> convex_hull;
316  convex_hull.setInputCloud(cloud_in);
317  convex_hull.setDimension(2);
318  convex_hull.reconstruct(hull);
319 
320  // Try fitting a rectangle
321  for (size_t i = 0; i < hull.size() - 1; ++i) {
322  // For each pair of hull points, determine the angle
323  double rise = hull[i + 1].y - hull[i].y;
324  double run = hull[i + 1].z - hull[i].z;
325  // and normalize..
326  {
327  double l = sqrt((rise * rise) + (run * run));
328  rise = rise / l;
329  run = run / l;
330  }
331 
332  // Build rotation matrix from change of basis
333  Eigen::Matrix3f rotation;
334  rotation(0, 0) = run;
335  rotation(0, 1) = rise;
336  rotation(0, 2) = 0.0;
337  rotation(1, 0) = -rise;
338  rotation(1, 1) = run;
339  rotation(1, 2) = 0.0;
340  rotation(2, 0) = 0.0;
341  rotation(2, 1) = 0.0;
342  rotation(2, 2) = 1.0;
343  Eigen::Matrix3f inv_rotation = rotation.inverse();
344 
345  // Project hull to new coordinate system
346  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB> projected_cloud;
347  for (size_t j = 0; j < hull.size(); ++j)
348  {
349  pcl::PointXYZRGB p;
350  p.getVector3fMap() = rotation * hull[j].getVector3fMap();
351  projected_cloud.push_back(p);
352  }
353 
354  // Compute min/max
355  double y_min = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
356  double y_max = std::numeric_limits<double>::min();
357  double z_min = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
358  double z_max = std::numeric_limits<double>::min();
359  for (size_t j = 0; j < projected_cloud.size(); ++j)
360  {
361  if (projected_cloud[j].y < y_min) y_min = projected_cloud[j].y;
362  if (projected_cloud[j].y > y_max) y_max = projected_cloud[j].y;
363 
364  if (projected_cloud[j].z < z_min) z_min = projected_cloud[j].z;
365  if (projected_cloud[j].z > z_max) z_max = projected_cloud[j].z;
366  }
367 
368 
369  // Is this the best estimate?
370  double area = (y_max - y_min) * (z_max - z_min);
371  if (area * height < min_volume)
372  {
373  //transformation = inv_plane_rotation * inv_rotation;
374  transformation = inv_rotation;
375  //dimensions->x = (x_max - x_min);
376  // dimensions->y = (y_max - y_min);
377  //dimensions->z = height;
378 
379  Eigen::Vector3f pose3f(projected_cloud[0].x + height / 2.0,(y_max + y_min) / 2.0, (z_max + z_min) / 2.0);
380  pose3f = transformation * pose3f;
381  pose.position.x = pose3f(0);
382  pose.position.y = pose3f(1);
383  pose.position.z = pose3f(2);
384  Eigen::Quaternionf q(transformation);
385  pose.orientation.x = q.x();
386  pose.orientation.y = q.y();
387  pose.orientation.z = q.z();
388  pose.orientation.w = q.w();
389  min_volume = area * height;
390  }
391  }
